titleStmt.title: A Brief account of the reasons for which the three estates of Scotland forfaulted the Late King James and setled K. William and Q. Mary upon the throne, anno 1689 and some of the reasons induced them to abolish episcopacy there.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
